1.text: Thaw the durian if it has been in the freezer.

2.text: Shake the fruit to see if you hear anything.

3.text: Check the stem for a light color and moist texture.

4.text: Smell the durian right at the stem to see if it has a strong aroma.

5.text: Feel the durian to make sure the skin is hard and tight.

6.text: Find the 5-pointed star-shaped lines on the fruit.

7.text: Hold the durian steady with a towel or cloth.

8.text: Use a sharp, sturdy knife to pierce the center of the star.

9.text: Twist the knife in each direction to dig into the seams.

10.text: Cut along each line with the knife.

11.text: Pull each incision apart with your hands to separate and open the fruit.
